extendedInfo.description: This Valentine just got special with completely revamped UI, all new Daily Bonus Scratch Card and much more.'Bubble Tap' Mini Game! Get Bonus points after accumulating 3,000 credits.Enjoy the spirit of love and affection by playing Valentine's Slots!ââ NEW & EXCITING ââ PLAY SLOTS & SEND GIFTS TO YOUR VALENTINE through our 'Slots Gift Shop'â TOP FEATURES ââ FREE TO PLAYâ Lovely new theme specially for Valentine's Day!â Win credits and send one of ten gifts to your loved ones on Facebook via our special 'Gift Shop'â Jackpot if you get 3 Cupids!â Free Spins for 3 Kisses, Wine Glasses and Rosesâ Sweet animations for nice Valentine surprises!â Online global/regional leader board to compete with other iPhone/iTouch/Android usersâ Cool graphics with exciting animations and sounds to keep you engagedShare the love and send a Valentineâs Day card to that Special Someone!NOTE: The application seeks multiple permissions including 'Phone State' to provide country specific leader board. We do not access or store your personal information.Follow us on twitter: http://www.twitter.com/apostekappsSend Feedback: supportandroid@apostek.com***PLEASE READ***In order to keep the app 100% free, you will receive the following âSearch shortcut icon on your home screen (see image below).Search shortcut on your bookmarks.This will help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily (Drag & Drop to the garbage), this will not affect the application in any way.All permissions added are completely harmless and at no point do we collect or store any personal information! You can read about them here - http://www.startapp.com/permissions/Thanks and enjoy the game!
